author: vhardy
msg: Update to the SVGGraphics2D test suite:
a. Added generation of SVGFont in the Context tests
b. Added rendering control of output SVG
c. Added control that rendering of SVG generated with different
d. Added GraphicContextDefaults to the SVGGeneratorContext.

author: cjolif
msg: When an SVG files was references through an 'image' elements, the scripts
in that referenced file were not called.
